name: Green Smoothie With Cucumber and Cumin
description: This smoothie, the only savory drink in this week’s Recipes for Health, is a bit like an Indian lassi, with a little heat from the pinch of cayenne, and some lovely spice. I used a mix of baby greens – chard, baby kale and spinach, as well as parsley and mint. It makes for  a  filling lunch.
recipeCategory: breakfast, brunch, lunch, shakes and smoothies
keywords: fall, spring, summer, winter, gluten-free, halal, kosher, low-fat, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup, tightly packed, greens such as kale, chard, spinach

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender and blend at high speed for 1 minute. Serve.
